comments:
Found in M5.
I created a Java bean in the default package and tried to deploy it as a Web
service. Here is the source:


public class Test {
	
	public String echo(String input){
		return input;
	}
	
	public String ping() {
		return "pong";
	}

}




The wizard failed on the Service Deployment Configuration page with the
following NPE:

We currently don't support creating a web service that is in the default 
package.  We should, however, be issuing a proper error message for this 
condition instead of throwing a null pointer exception.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 94010 ***
Verfied in RC5. I noticed the warning message that the use of the default package was discouraged. Closing this.
